text: Gothenburg-based post-metalcore band Aligned is back with their second single of 2025 and it's a banger. Aligned is now streaming their new single "Control" alongside a captivating and moody music video directed by Linda Florin (Dark Tranquillity, The Unguided). On the single itself, Aligned offered: "'Control' further shows the progression Aligned is headed towards a unique take on modern metal, merging the raw intensity of metalcore with subtle touches of melodic metal and a haunting sense of melancholy." Check it out above! Once you've stoped humming that chorus to yourself – and it might take a while for that to happen – go ahead and give Aligned a follow on all their socials right here. html:
Gothenburg-based post-metalcore band Aligned is back with their second single of 2025 and it's a banger. Aligned is now streaming their new single "Control" alongside a captivating and moody music video directed by Linda Florin (Dark Tranquillity, The Unguided).

On the single itself, Aligned offered: "'Control' further shows the progression Aligned is headed towards a unique take on modern metal, merging the raw intensity of metalcore with subtle touches of melodic metal and a haunting sense of melancholy."

Check it out above! Once you've stoped humming that chorus to yourself – and it might take a while for that to happen – go ahead and give Aligned a follow on all their socials right here.
